item.title: My two silly cats
item.description: This is my first born son And this is my first born daughter
item.content:
This is my first born son

And this is my first born daughter

item.title: Yǐxià shì guānyú bēishāng xiānnǚ de wénzhāng
item.description: Chū yú mǒu zhǒng yuányīn, zhège xiānnǚ hěn shāngxīn :< Wǒ bù zhīdào gāi zěnme zuò cáinéng ràng tā gǎnjué hǎoxiē. Suǒyǐ wǒ xiě zhè piān bówén xīwàng tā néng bǎochí kāilǎng hé zìxìn. Zhù nǐ yǒngyuǎn kuàilè, shíxiàn nǐ xiǎng yào de. Wǒ yǒngyuǎn zhīchí nǐ, bǎobèi!
item.content:
Chū yú mǒu zhǒng yuányīn, zhège xiānnǚ hěn shāngxīn :<

Wǒ bù zhīdào gāi zěnme zuò cáinéng ràng tā gǎnjué hǎoxiē.

Suǒyǐ wǒ xiě zhè piān bówén xīwàng tā néng bǎochí kāilǎng hé zìxìn.

Zhù nǐ yǒngyuǎn kuàilè, shíxiàn nǐ xiǎng yào de.

Wǒ yǒngyuǎn zhīchí nǐ, bǎobèi!
